name: TimeShifters
description:
Support us on Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/Fossett_Gaming

The year is 2131, the world is held hostage under a dictator who created a time machine to change his past to rise to power, your job is to go back and stop him from succeeding but be careful as he has sent his TimeShifters to stop you!


TimeShifters gameplay is fast paced and finishing fast rewards you more, take on challenges and try get the platinum trophy's, learn the layout of every level and difficulty and try to beat your time!



Challenges can consist of pig racing, darts, barrel shooting, blackjack, pint smashing, solving murder cases and much more!



Environments have lots of detail to interactive with like smashing windows, potting ball on a pool table, smashing plates, blowing up crates or even using the items in the environment like a fire extinguisher!


  • 12 STORY MISSIONS SET IN EITHER THE PAST, PRESENT OR FUTURE.
  • 30+ CRAZY CHALLANGE MISSIONS LIKE PIG RACING, PINT SMASHING AND SOLVING MURDER CASES.
  • INTERACT WITH YOUR ENVIRONMENT.
  • FULL OF EXTRAS LIKE PIMP MY PIG.
  • USE WEAPONS FROM DIFFERENT TIME PERIODS.
